mapper.select: SELECT JOB_NAME FROM BATCH_JOB_INSTANCE GROUP BY JOB_NAME

SELECT A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID ,A.JOB_NAME ,B.JOB_EXECUTION_ID ,TO_CHAR(B.START_TIME, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME ,TO_CHAR(B.END_TIME, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME ,B.STATUS ,C.EXIT_CODE ,C.EXIT_MESSAGE ,C.STEP_NAME ,C.STEP_EXECUTION_ID , (SELECT COUNT (1) CNT FROM SYS0084M D WHERE C.STEP_EXECUTION_ID = D.STEP_EXECUTION_ID) MESSAGE_COUNT FROM BATCH_JOB_INSTANCE A ,BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION B ,BATCH_STEP_EXECUTION C WHERE A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = B.JOB_INSTANCE_ID AND B.JOB_EXECUTION_ID = C.JOB_EXECUTION_ID AND A.JOB_NAME = nvl(#{jobName}, A.JOB_NAME)
AND B.STATUS IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (#{status}, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (#{status}, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
AND C.EXIT_CODE IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (#{exitCode}, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (#{exitCode}, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
AND B.START_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{searchStartDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND B.START_TIME < TO_DATE(#{searchEndDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1
ORDER BY A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID DESC, B.JOB_EXECUTION_ID DESC

SELECT STEP_EXECUTION_ID ,SEQ ,JOB_PROC_NAME ,STEP_PROC_NAME ,PROCEDURE_NAME ,MSG ,CRT_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT FROM SYS0084M WHERE STEP_EXECUTION_ID = #{stepexecutionid} ORDER BY SEQ
